articles.author: Kosaku Narioka
articles.title: HSBC Names Chairman After Yearlong Search - The Wall Street Journal
articles.description: Brendan Nelson is selected after drawn-out hunt highlighting difficulty of role straddling U.K. and Asia
articles.content:
HSBC named Brendan Nelson as chairman following a yearlong search to fill one of the biggest jobs in the global finance industry.
The 76-year-old Nelson, a longtime partner at KPMG, joined the U.K. … [+289 chars]
